q1: Did France win the 2018 World Cup?
a1: Yes! France just won the World Cup.
a2: France one it one time before in 1998.
q3: What was their best result in the World Cup before 1998?
a3: France won the bronze medal in 1958 and 1986 World Cups.
q4: How many times have they reached the world cup?
a4: France has reached the world cup on 21 different occassions with the first appearance coming in 1930
q5: Out of their 21 appearances, how many times have they won>
a5: They have won the world cup twice. Once in 1998 and again in 2018.
